mapper.select: SELECT `id` AS `id`, `text` AS `text` FROM `etb_bbs`.`boards` WHERE BINARY `id` = #{id} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `etb_bbs`.`review_articles` (user_email, board_id, beer_index, score, content_good, content_bad, view, written_on, modified_on) VALUES (#{userEmail}, #{boardId}, #{beerIndex}, #{score}, #{contentGood}, #{contentBad}, #{view}, IFNULL(#{writtenOn}, DEFAULT(`written_on`)), IFNULL(#{modifiedOn}, DEFAULT(`modified_on`)))
